content: crochet a cute **ladybug baby rattle** for your newborn baby or make one as a gift for a baby shower *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** sport 2 fine 2 5 mm 12 uk crochet hook tapestry needle cotton stuffing for amigurumi rattle ball diameter ~ 24 mm **yarn** i used schachenmayr catania 137 yds / 125 m per 50 g in the following colors **black** schwarz 110 **red** signalrot 115 **white** weiß 106 feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge **size** 4 7 12 cm by 4 11 cm measured without the legs **gauge** 8 rounds in single_crochet in 2 5 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
